data.title: Woodlawn Residential Commons
data.text:
ABOUT WOODLAWN RESIDENTIAL COMMONS

Woodlawn Residential Commons, opened in 2020, is a vibrant tapestry of tradition and modernity. Designed by Elkus Manfredi Architects, it nurtures connections and friendships amidst diverse communities. Whether under starry Chicago skies or in shared moments of camaraderie, Woodlawn fosters a spirit of unity and intellectual curiosity, reflecting the University’s progressive vision.

QUICK FACTS

Dining Commons Woodlawn Dining Commons Room Types Available Singles, doubles, and apartments Maximum Floor Levels 11 Flooring Carpet Storage Armoires Elevators Yes Windows Open with screens Window Coverings Blinds Air Conditioning Yes Ceiling Fans No Workout Facility No
